Sentencas: A novel chemical looping power generation system is presented based on the biomass-coal co-gasification with steam.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analyses of a biomass-coal co-gasification power generation system

Sentencas: The effects of different key operation parameters including biomass mass fraction (R-b), steam to carbon mole ratio (R-sc), gasification temperature (T-g) and iron to fuel mole ratio (R-if) on the system performances like energy efficiency (eta(e)), total energy efficiency (eta(te)), exergy efficiency (eta(ex)), total exergy efficiency (eta(tex)) and carbon capture rate (eta(cc)) are analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analyses of a biomass-coal co-gasification power generation system

Sentencas: A benchmark condition is set, under which eta(te), eta(tex) and eta(cc) are found to be 39.9%, 37.6% and 96.0%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analyses of a biomass-coal co-gasification power generation system

Sentencas: Furthermore, detailed energy Sankey diagram and exergy Grassmann diagram are drawn for the entire system operating under the benchmark condition.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analyses of a biomass-coal co-gasification power generation system

Sentencas: The energy and exergy efficiencies of the units composing the system are also predicted.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analyses of a biomass-coal co-gasification power generation system
